content.original: Aborted Colony
content.prevOriginal: Aborted Colony
content.content: Aborted Colony

content.original: The colonists have assembled into a convoy of vehicles.
content.prevOriginal: The colonists have assembled into a convoy of vehicles.
content.content: The colonists have assembled into a convoy of vehicles.

content.original: We'll rendezvous with them at this location, and then provide an escort.
content.prevOriginal: We'll rendezvous with them at this location, and then provide an escort.
content.content: We'll rendezvous with them at this location, and then provide an escort.

content.original: These aren't fighters, Commander. They'll die under any serious assault. So be careful.
content.prevOriginal: These aren't fighters, Commander. They'll die under any serious assault. So be careful.
content.content: These aren't fighters, Commander. They'll die under any serious assault. So be careful.

content.original: The survivors of the failed colony are safely away, Commander. Good job.
content.prevOriginal: The survivors of the failed colony are safely away, Commander. Good job.
content.content: The survivors of the failed colony are safely away, Commander. Good job.

content.original: This is a disaster. We need to review the mission logs and see what went wrong.
content.prevOriginal: This is a disaster. We need to review the mission logs and see what went wrong.
content.content: This is a disaster. We need to review the mission logs and see what went wrong.

content.original: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.content: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.

content.original: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} *really* doesn't want these colonists making it out of here.
content.prevOriginal: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} *really* doesn't want these colonists making it out of here.
content.content: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} *really* doesn't want these colonists making it out of here.

content.original: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.prevOriginal: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.content: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.

content.original: I've got the convoy leader on comms, Commander. They're ready to move out. Keep up with them and keep them safe.
content.prevOriginal: I've got the convoy leader on comms, Commander. They're ready to move out. Keep up with them and keep them safe.
content.content: I've got the convoy leader on comms, Commander. They're ready to move out. Keep up with them and keep them safe.

content.original: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.prevOriginal: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.content: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!

content.original: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.prevOriginal: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.content: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.

content.original: My guess is that there was a credible threat made on the colony, and that's why they're pulling out. Expect fighting, Commander.
content.prevOriginal: My guess is that there was a credible threat made on the colony, and that's why they're pulling out. Expect fighting, Commander.
content.content: My guess is that there was a credible threat made on the colony, and that's why they're pulling out. Expect fighting, Commander.

content.original: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try and stop the player from reaching the rally point.
content.prevOriginal: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try and stop the player from reaching the rally point.
content.content: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try and stop the player from reaching the rally point.

content.prevOriginal: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Blocking Force
content.content: Destroy {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} Blocking Force

content.prevOriginal: Secure the Convoy Rally Point
content.content: Secure the Convoy Rally Point

content.prevOriginal: Escort {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy To Evac Point
content.content: Escort {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} Convoy To Evac Point

content.prevOriginal: The objective to destroy enemy units which will attempt to block the convoy from reaching its destination.

content.content: Protect the all units in Convoy during Extraction, suffering no losses.

content.prevOriginal: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.

content.prevOriginal: USELESS OBJECTIVE
content.content: USELESS OBJECTIVE

content.prevOriginal: Protect Convoy while Dropship Arrives
content.content: Protect Convoy while Dropship Arrives

content.original: USELESS OBJECTIVE
content.prevOriginal: USELESS OBJECTIVE
content.content: USELESS OBJECTIVE

content.original: Protect Convoy as they Embark on the Dropship
content.prevOriginal: Protect Convoy as they Embark on the Dropship
content.content: Protect Convoy as they Embark on the Dropship

content.original: This system was targeted as part of a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} expansion plan. Unfortunately, the colonial plan fell through, and we now have to extract our people from the planet's surface before they're intercepted by hostile forces. As the colony was a secret, thanks to the conflicting and dubious claims on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, we cannot be seen to mount a major rescue operation. We need a deniable middle-man.
content.prevOriginal: This system was targeted as part of a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} expansion plan. Unfortunately, the colonial plan fell through, and we now have to extract our people from the planet's surface before they're intercepted by hostile forces. As the colony was a secret, thanks to the conflicting and dubious claims on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, we cannot be seen to mount a major rescue operation. We need a deniable middle-man.
content.content: This system was targeted as part of a {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} expansion plan. Unfortunately, the colonial plan fell through, and we now have to extract our people from the planet's surface before they're intercepted by hostile forces. As the colony was a secret, thanks to the conflicting and dubious claims on {TGT_SYSTEM.Name}, we cannot be seen to mount a major rescue operation. We need a deniable middle-man.

content.original: Ammunition Convoy
content.prevOriginal: Ammunition Convoy
content.content: Ammunition Convoy

content.original: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.
content.content: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.

content.original: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.
content.content: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.

content.original: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.
content.content: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.

content.original: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.
content.prevOriginal: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.
content.content: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.

content.original: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.
content.prevOriginal: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.
content.content: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.

content.original: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.content: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.

content.original: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.
content.content: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.

content.original: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.prevOriginal: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.content: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.

content.original: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!
content.prevOriginal: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!
content.content: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!

content.original: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.prevOriginal: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.content: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!

content.original: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.prevOriginal: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.content: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.

content.original: Not much to say, Commander. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} made a tactical fumble, and we're going to bail them out. The convoy lead is privately offering to make sure a few crates of ammo 'fall off the truck' if we get them home.
content.prevOriginal: Not much to say, Commander. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} made a tactical fumble, and we're going to bail them out. The convoy lead is privately offering to make sure a few crates of ammo 'fall off the truck' if we get them home.

content.original: We've had reports of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near one of our outlying bases. Unfortunately, we already have a military supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.
content.prevOriginal: We've had reports of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near one of our outlying bases. Unfortunately, we already have a military supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.
content.content: We've had reports of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near one of our outlying bases. Unfortunately, we already have a military supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.

content.original: Civilian Extraction
content.prevOriginal: Civilian Extraction
content.content: Civilian Extraction

content.original: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} researchers are en route in APCs, Commander. I'm sending you coordinates for the rendezvous point. Secure the site.
content.prevOriginal: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} researchers are en route in APCs, Commander. I'm sending you coordinates for the rendezvous point. Secure the site.
content.content: The {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} researchers are en route in APCs, Commander. I'm sending you coordinates for the rendezvous point. Secure the site.

content.original: Get them safely to their evac. I'll coordinate the pickups from here. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Get them safely to their evac. I'll coordinate the pickups from here. Oliveira out.
content.content: Get them safely to their evac. I'll coordinate the pickups from here. Oliveira out.

content.original: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and I have Sumire moments away from your position for a pick up. Be ready.
content.prevOriginal: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and I have Sumire moments away from your position for a pick up. Be ready.
content.content: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and I have Sumire moments away from your position for a pick up. Be ready.

content.original: Pack it in, Commander. Nothing left to do here.
content.prevOriginal: Pack it in, Commander. Nothing left to do here.
content.content: Pack it in, Commander. Nothing left to do here.

content.original: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.content: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.

content.original: Contact! That'll be {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces hunting our charges. Remember, our contract terms are to protect the convoy.
content.prevOriginal: Contact! That'll be {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces hunting our charges. Remember, our contract terms are to protect the convoy.
content.content: Contact! That'll be {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces hunting our charges. Remember, our contract terms are to protect the convoy.

content.original: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.prevOriginal: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.content: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.

content.original: The scientists are approaching the rendezvous point now. Watch over them, Commander. Those APCs are fragile.
content.prevOriginal: The scientists are approaching the rendezvous point now. Watch over them, Commander. Those APCs are fragile.
content.content: The scientists are approaching the rendezvous point now. Watch over them, Commander. Those APCs are fragile.

content.original: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!

content.original: There is probably more to this than {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} are saying, but our role would be limited to escorting a convoy of personnel carriers to an evac point. The remainder of this situation is someone else's problem.

content.original: Our research facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been under constant attack from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces for some time. Rather than continue to risk their lives, we are evacuating the noncombatants. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} will pay handsomely for a mercenary unit to protect them from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} aggression.
content.prevOriginal: Our research facility on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has been under constant attack from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} forces for some time. Rather than continue to risk their lives, we are evacuating the noncombatants. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} will pay handsomely for a mercenary unit to protect them from {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} aggression.

content.original: Humanitarians
content.prevOriginal: Humanitarians
content.content: Humanitarians

content.original: The convoy is just up ahead, awaiting our arrival.
content.prevOriginal: The convoy is just up ahead, awaiting our arrival.
content.content: The convoy is just up ahead, awaiting our arrival.

content.original: Move to their position and provide support as needed.
content.prevOriginal: Move to their position and provide support as needed.
content.content: Move to their position and provide support as needed.

content.original: Get them to safety, keep them intact, and get out of there when it's done.
content.prevOriginal: Get them to safety, keep them intact, and get out of there when it's done.
content.content: Get them to safety, keep them intact, and get out of there when it's done.

content.original: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and I have Sumire moments away from your position for a pick up. Be ready.

content.original: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.content: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.

content.original: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Hard to say which side they're on in this war, but they're bound for your position. Assume the worst.
content.prevOriginal: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Hard to say which side they're on in this war, but they're bound for your position. Assume the worst.

content.original: A convoy of {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} doctors ministering to those recovering from the recent conflicts here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have become caught behind enemy lines when the cease fire collapsed. A lance of mechs tasked with the rescue have gone missing, so we are desperate for assistance from anyone.

content.original: Here in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has been an oppressive presence for some time, which has led to a number of revolutionary leaders rising up from the common people to strike at the status quo. One such leader has been targeted by {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.ShortName} for elimination. It's in the interest of the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} leadership that this rabble rouser survives.
content.prevOriginal: Here in the {TGT_SYSTEM.name} system, {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Name} has been an oppressive presence for some time, which has led to a number of revolutionary leaders rising up from the common people to strike at the status quo. content.original: We're looking for a mercenary company with a reputation for discretion. A personal friend of our leadership here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has requested protection for a convoy of his, but {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} can't commit our own forces to this task. While his convoy is armed and armored, he suspects that his enemies have hired mercenaries of their own to interdict this shipment.
content.prevOriginal: We're looking for a mercenary company with a reputation for discretion. A personal friend of our leadership here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has requested protection for a convoy of his, but {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} can't commit our own forces to this task. While his convoy is armed and armored, he suspects that his enemies have hired mercenaries of their own to interdict this shipment.

A personal friend of our leadership here in {TGT_SYSTEM.name} has requested protection for a convoy of his, but {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} can't commit our own forces to this task. content.original: This is a convoy escort mission. We need to take a predetermined position, rendezvous with the convoy, and get it to its destination in one piece.
content.prevOriginal: This is a convoy escort mission. We need to take a predetermined position, rendezvous with the convoy, and get it to its destination in one piece.
content.content: This is a convoy escort mission. We need to take a predetermined position, rendezvous with the convoy, and get it to its destination in one piece.

content.original: The rendezvous point is here, designated Zone Alpha.
content.prevOriginal: The rendezvous point is here, designated Zone Alpha.
content.content: The rendezvous point is here, designated Zone Alpha.

content.original: After you've met up with the convoy, get it to the extraction zone, and then get out yourselves. Good luck, Commander.

content.original: Theft and banditry on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have become a tremendous problem of late, to the point that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} corporate interests can't safely move goods overland. We need a mercenary company capable of defending our convoy and deterring any hostile force that may want what it's carrying. Payment will be remitted upon our receipt of the convoy and the successful evac of your lance.
content.prevOriginal: Theft and banditry on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have become a tremendous problem of late, to the point that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} corporate interests can't safely move goods overland. We need a mercenary company capable of defending our convoy and deterring any hostile force that may want what it's carrying. Payment will be remitted upon our receipt of the convoy and the successful evac of your lance.
content.content: Theft and banditry on {TGT_SYSTEM.name} have become a tremendous problem of late, to the point that {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} corporate interests can't safely move goods overland. We need a mercenary company capable of defending our convoy and deterring any hostile force that may want what it's carrying. Payment will be remitted upon our receipt of the convoy and the successful evac of your lance.

content.original: Supply Convoy
content.prevOriginal: Supply Convoy
content.content: Supply Convoy

content.original: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.
content.prevOriginal: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.
content.content: Commander, the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy is right on schedule, and as predicted, we're picking up {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} units in the area.

content.original: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.
content.prevOriginal: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.
content.content: Move to intercept the convoy and provide cover and support while they escape.

content.original: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.
content.prevOriginal: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.
content.content: Once they're safely away, you can clean up the opposition or evac yourself; it's your call. Oliveira out.

content.original: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.
content.prevOriginal: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.
content.content: Excellent work, Commander. The convoy safely reached extraction, and we're ready for a pick up.

content.original: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.
content.prevOriginal: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.
content.content: That's the whole convoy down, Commander. Damn! I'm scrubbing the mission.

content.original: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.prevOriginal: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
content.content: Commander. The enemy has deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.

content.original: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.
content.prevOriginal: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.
content.content: More contacts on the sensors, Commander. Looks like they're sending in reinforcements.

content.original: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.prevOriginal: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
content.content: You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.

content.original: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!
content.prevOriginal: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!
content.content: Signal from the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} convoy leader, Commander. They're headed to the extraction point now. Keep them alive!

content.original: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.prevOriginal: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!
content.content: Keep in mind that the convoy will try to stay near you for protection. Continue advancing to get them to the extract point!

content.original: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.prevOriginal: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
content.content: And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.

content.original: Not much to say, Commander. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} made a tactical fumble, and we're going to bail them out.
content.prevOriginal: Not much to say, Commander. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} made a tactical fumble, and we're going to bail them out.
content.content: Not much to say, Commander. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.ShortName} made a tactical fumble, and we're going to bail them out.

content.prevOriginal: Destroy Enemy Blocking Force
content.content: Destroy Enemy Blocking Force

content.original: We've had reports of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near one of our outlying bases. Unfortunately, we already have a supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.
content.prevOriginal: We've had reports of {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} activity near one of our outlying bases. Unfortunately, we already have a supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.

Unfortunately, we already have a supply convoy in the field, and it will be easy prey for a force of 'Mechs. We need you to rendezvous with the convoy and protect it while it's being evacuated.
